title: HQ 100-418910 – Labor Defense Council – IWW Strike San Pedro 1927

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: HQ 100-418910 – Labor Defense Council – IWW Strike San Pedro 1927
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I request a digital copy of FBI Headquarters file 100-418910, titled “Labor Defense Council – IWW Strike, San Pedro, California, 1927.”  Because portions of this file have been released to previous requesters, I ask that the releasable material be provided electronically (PDF).

The records will be used solely for non-commercial academic research.  I request a waiver of duplication fees up to 100 pages pursuant to 5 U.S.C. § 552(a)(4)(A)(iii).  Should anticipated fees exceed this amount, please notify me before processing.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this request.

Sincerely,
- Dylan Delprato

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Dylan D
